channel.title: The Zen Programming Language
channel.description: Recent content on The Zen Programming Language

item.title: Introduction: Yet Another Programming Language
item.description: This module is a gentle introduction to the world of Zen.

item.title: Basics of Zen: The Tradition of Hello World!
item.description: In this module, you will learn the basics of writing simple Zen programs.

item.title: Variables, Values, and Data Types
item.description: You will learn the basics of working with variables, values, and data types in Zen.

item.title: Operators, Operands, and Expressions
item.description: In this module, you will learn about operators, operands, and expressions.

item.title: Conditional Statements: How Your Programs Make Choices
item.description: In this module, you will learn about the if statement.

item.title: Iterative Statements: How Your Programs Repeat Things
item.description: In this module, you will learn the two iterative statements in Zen.

item.title: Classes and Objects
item.description: In this chapter, you discover the basics of creating classes in Zen.

item.title: Functions
item.description: You will learn how to create your own functions, invoking functions, accepting parameters, and returning values.

item.title: Constructors: How Your Objects are Initialized
item.description: You will learn about constructors, including their declaration and invocation.

item.title: Exceptions
item.description: In this module, you will see what happens when programs encounter unexpected situations.

item.title: Packages: How Your Source Code is Organized
item.description: In this module, you will learn about creating packages and importing packages.

item.title: Arrays
item.description: Chapter 16 Arrays So far in this manual, you have written programs which work with few variables.

item.title: Strings
item.description: Chapter 16 Strings A string is a very common object in Zen.

item.title: Why I Created Zen: Yet Another Programming Language
item.description: Zen is a general-purpose programming language designed to build simple, reliable and efficient programs.
